name: PECKHAM DIE: DEMON FRED AND THE TOWER OF DOOM (DEMO)
name_original: PECKHAM DIE: DEMON FRED AND THE TOWER OF DOOM (DEMO)
description:
PECKHAM DIE: DEMON FRED AND THE TOWER OF DOOM is a work in progress build of this idea I had for a platformer.

CONTROLS:

LEFT/RIGHT: MOVE 

UP/DOWN: CLIMBING, OPEN DOOR (UP ONLY)

SPACE: JUMP,  NEXT CUTSCENE, START GAME

SHIFT: FIREBALL

Being very inspired by games like Castlevania and Mega Man, I wanted to see if I could create a game using my own world-building and add my art style and sense of humour into it.

I am working on a build which is the entire first level. Hoping to share it soon.
Fred
